Appalachian State University Honors student pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Psychology, Health Services Concentration, with minors in Public Health and Statistics.

I'd love to connect! Feel free to email me at bennetttl@appstate.edu.


Theresia has spent the majority of her college career working as a student employee in the ASU Office of Community-Engaged Leadership, and had the opportunity of interning at the Hospitality House of Northwest North Carolina this past summer. Originally from Cary, NC, she prefers to spend her free time baking, hiking, and crocheting.
